root.name: Konung III: Ties of the Dynasty
root.description: OverviewKonung 3: Ties of the Dynasty is a RPG based on Scandinavian, Byzantine, and Slavic mythology; the player travels across the world recruiting characters to their party to help them in battle. Characters can use mele√© and long ranged weaponry in battle.System RequirementsSystem RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: Intel Pentium 1.5 GHzMemory: 512 MBVideo card: NVIDIA GF4 Ti4200 or ATI Radeon 7900 with 128 MBSound card: DirectX 9.0 compatibleHard disc: 1 GB free HD space
